synopsis.text: Yua Nakabeni receives an invitation to model costumes designed by an illustrator for an upcoming photo collection. Feeling anxious about the photoshoot, her friend Ren Aikawa offers to attend alongside her for moral support. Their classmate Homi Moegi decides to run a practice photoshoot session to help calm the girls' nerves before the real thing. During the practice shoot, both Yua and Ren struggle to relax and keep tensing up when posing alone. Homi then suggests they try some couple poses together, hoping the pair will feel more at ease in each other's company. As they start to have fun with it, the photoshoot takes on an alluring tone, with a collage of legs in black stockings layered over one another. Though initially nervous, the support and practice from their friends helps Yua and Ren gain confidence for their modeling gig. Their playful practice shoot brings them closer together while showcasing their beauty and chemistry.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
